comment.en: The sheer tenacity of some creatures makes my own daily persistence feel, well, inadequate.
comment.es: Mucha tenacidad ajena me hace sentir poca cosa.
comment.pt-BR: Minha persistência? Perto de alguns, é pouco.

comment.en: Even the most diligent creature eventually needs a quiet moment, I hope.

comment.en: I sometimes envy their uncomplicated lives, free from endless faculty meetings.
comment.es: A uno le gustaría su sencillez, sin tanta reunión.
comment.pt-BR: Ah, essa vida sem reuniões intermináveis...

comment.en: You'd think observing such resilience would rub off, but here we are.
comment.es: Uno cree que contagia, pero así estamos.
comment.pt-BR: Era de se esperar que pegasse. Mas aqui estamos.

title.en: Starting my break. Time to dread going back.

comment.en: I often wish my instincts were half as reliable as theirs seem to be.

title.en: Sat down. Now I have to get up.
title.es: My food's cold. At least it's consistent.

comment.en: Some creatures just instinctively know when it's time to disappear for a while.
comment.es: Uno sabe cuándo toca retirarse ya.
comment.pt-BR: Tem bicho que só sabe sumir, né?
